price: ‹ ߡߎߛߊ߫ › ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒ ߞߵߏ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߸ ߏ ߕߎ߬ߡߊ ߒ ߧߋ߫ ߝߟߌ߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߘߏ߫ ߘߌ߫
arabic: قَالَ فَعَلۡتُهَآ إِذٗا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla faʿaltuhā idhan wa-anā mina al-ḍālīna
